posts.title: Getting Started with Next.js
posts.content: Learn how to build amazing web applications with Next.js. Next.js is a React framework that makes it easy to build static and dynamic websites.
posts.author: John Doe

posts.title: React Hooks Explained
posts.content: Hooks allow you to use state and other React features without writing a class. They make your JavaScript code more reusable and easier to understand.
posts.author: Jane Smith

posts.title: Tailwind CSS Tips and Tricks
posts.content: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework. In this post, we'll explore various tips and tricks to maximize your productivity with Tailwind.
posts.author: Bob Johnson
